channel.title: [PI] Pk Forever Client + Server Coder needed
channel.description:
Hello, i need a coder to develope my client and the server, it's based of PI...
I already have made a website for it, so only client+server have to be ready ;)
It has many customs [img]http://i1115.photobucket.com/albums/k543/dragoon_wuut/advertise2.png[/img]
So if you are interested please tell me a few things, like:
[code] Name (real /or nick): Experience: Why do you want to do this? [/code]
[size=4]If you are NOT interested please do not post, it only would be spam[/size]

item.title: [PI] Pk Forever Client + Server Coder needed
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:4, topic:429840”]Name (real /or nick:( I go by Funny/Loveandpower/Luvandpower/Eddie Conner/and Luv on rsps related sites.
Experience: I think my server releases and what they became are good enough experience (final judgement is/was torvascape became. Torvascape has been built over by members of the community for the past year.
Why do you want to do this? boredom? don’t really know if I want to let’s talk first to see what goals you have[/quote]

^^ When this man offers to help on development depending on your perseverance and goals, don’t think. Accept.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Pk Forever Client + Server Coder needed
